parameters.name: numtrials
parameters.description: Number of trials to use. Note that there are 40 cards in each deck=120, and so cards get rotated without being shuffled if used up

parameters.name: DelayBetweenTrials
parameters.description: How long between trials, in which the feedback appears.

parameters.name: DelayWithBeep
parameters.description: Whether to give audio feedback between trials.  Feedback is a buzz and a 'kaching' sound

parameters.name: UseMouse
parameters.description: Should we use the mouse  (use 1; use 0 for the keyboard)?

parameters.name: shuffledecks
parameters.description: whether decks should be shuffled.  Shuffling happens in epochs of size 10, to maintain the reward structure within sets of 10.   The default is off
